items.sentence: There are some people who think it\'s a bad idea.
I can\'t be the only one who thinks Tom is crazy.
I can\'t believe Tom left without saying goodbye.
All the boys on the team were given new uniforms.
This is something that\'s never been done before.
It\'s been three years since Tom moved to Boston.
It\'s difficult to understand why you want to go.
It\'s impossible to tell the Jackson twins apart.
It\'s likely to take much longer than you expect.
I can\'t believe Tom and Mary are still together.
